Text: RE Another Hour description aid for youPST gracias Original Message From Semperger Cara Sent Wednesday April AM To Aldis Laura Subject Another Hour description aid for you This is a visual representation of how hours are broken out and their designations File HoursCheatsheetppt

RE Definitions for the terms you gave me yesterdayPST Thanks for the tremendous help If other terms come up that would be helpful for a Position Manager design could you please send them to me for inclusiondiscussion Hope your travel was pleasant See you again sometime Laura Original Message From Semperger Cara Sent Wednesday April AM To Aldis Laura Subject Definitions for the terms you gave me yesterday Good Morning Laura Here are the definitions as I see them Term Definition Example Next Day The next Preschedule day MTW day ThFS Fri Sun Mon this will vary with holidays Balance of the week The next Preschedule day thru Sun April Balance of the Month The next Preschedule day thru the last calendar day of the same month April April hour grid Linear expresssion of the day Peak Heavy Load Hours The heavy use time of the day HE HE PST HE Hour Ending For the hour of am to am is HE Off Peak Light Load Hours The lower use time of the day MTWTFS HE AND Sun Holidays Half hour grid Linear expression of the day divided into minute blocks Hourly The next hour I am not quite sure what you are after here Date Range The expression of deal length Deal date Hope this is helpful Cara Also this is a reference sheet that I worked up for the project that Glenn and I worked on together there may be more data in there that is helpful to you File Enron PDX Termsdoc

Please test Deal Entry Cc Deal Entry needs your user testing today The Production freeze starts tomorrow so we have to move this today if it is ok or it cannot be moved for another weeks Kroum made some changes so that the long deals done in Canada will not crash the system You should not see a change at all They had over transactions that replication could not keep up with but that has been fixed I will be calling you to make sure you are able to test I appreciate all your help Thank you Laura Aldis Quality AssuranceEnPower Support Group
